conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D criteria met flawlessly.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals with precise wall thickness and clear volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout. All rooms, partitions, and openings are correctly placed. Minor simplification of the laundry closet wall.

interior_elements.notes: All furniture, bathroom fixtures, and laundry units are present and correctly scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. One point deducted for minor door swing/threshold visual overlapping at the entrance.

detected_errors.description: The laundry/closet door and wall geometry is slightly simplified compared to the complex angles in the 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D translation of the architectural floor plan.
